Package org.ctoolkit.restapi.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LocalResourceProvider<T>
    The interface that provides possibility to plug-in right before a remote resource retrieval (either get or list).
    Patch<T>
    An interface that acts as an input resource that is a subset of the origin resource.
    ResourceFacade
    Uniform client facade API to perform common operations on top of REST to serve a resources of various REST APIs through single interface.
    RestExecutorAdaptee<T,I>
    The adaptee interface to provide execute implementation for REST like operations on top of concrete type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ClientErrorException
    The client error, the request that could not be understood by the server.
    HttpFailureException
    The base class as runtime exception for all HTTP status codes that represents a failure.
    NotFoundException
    The exception thrown once the server has not found anything matching the Request-URI.
    RemoteServerErrorException
    The remote server unexpected error.
    RequestTimeoutException
    The exception thrown once the client did not produce a request within the time that the server was prepared to wait.
    UnauthorizedException
    The unauthorized exception thrown once the request requires user authentication.
